network_io

Class IoStreamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • network_io.IoStreamHandler

  • public class IoStreamHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A network controller used to get and update comment from/to the server. Adapted From https://github.com/zjullion/PicPosterComplete/blob/master/src/ca/ualberta/cs/picposter/network/ElasticSearchOperations.java

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String favSubKey 
      static java.lang.String LOG_TAG 
      static java.lang.String SERVER_URL 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IoStreamHandler()
      Constructs a IOStreamHandler object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkEditSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, java.lang.String userName, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Check if the given userName is the same of the author of the comment with the given comment id, if it is, direct the user to the EditPage in the UI thread(CommentPageActivity).
      void Clean()
      Testing method used to trash all stuff on the server.
      void commit_edit_comment(java.lang.String commentId, java.lang.String newTitle, java.lang.String newContent)
      Update a edited comment in to the server.
      void commitUpdateComment(Comment comment)
      Update a comment with its own id to the web server, if the comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this comment will be added to the server.
      void load_update_TopLevelIdSet(java.lang.String id, PublishActivity activity)
      Add a comment id to the top level IdSet and update the IdSet in the server while publish a new top level comment.
      void loadAndSetSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, TextView commentView, TextView authorInfo, ImageView pic, CommentMap cm, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Load a specific Comment by its own Id ; Set the content of this comment in to a TextView ;Set anthorInfo,time posted and location(if its not null) of this comment.
      void loadSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, CommentMap cm, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Put a Comment in to the CommentMap with the specific id from the web server in the CommentPageActivity(sub level).
      void loadSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, CommentMap cm, HomePageActivity activity)
      Put a Comment with the specific id into the CommentMap from the web server in the HomePageActivity(top level).
      void loadSpecificCommentForCache(java.lang.String commentId, CacheController cc, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Load a comment specified by id as favorite and store the comment and all its replies in to the sharedpreferences.
      void loadSpecificCommentForCacheReply(java.lang.String commentId, java.lang.String parentId, CacheController cc, CommentPageActivity activity)
      Load a comment for cache ,store it in the sharedpreferences with the key value equals to this comment's parent Id.
      void loadTopLevelComments(CommentMap topLevelComments, HomePageActivity activity)
      Load all of the top level comments in to the CommentMap.
      void replySpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId, java.lang.String replyId)
      Load a specific Comment by it's id and add an reply Comment's id to this comment's reply IdSet.
      void set_up_edit_page(java.lang.String commentId, EditText title, EditText content, ImageView pic, EditPageActivity activity)
      Load a specific comment, Set the content of this comment in to a EditText, Set the title of this comment in to a EditText, set the author info ,time posted,and the location (if not null) into a TextView, set the Picture of this comment(if not null) in to an ImageView in the EditPageActivity.
      void updateTopLevelIdSet(IdSet topLevelIdSet)
      Update the top level comment's IdSet which stored in the server, if there's nothing in the server, then add it to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • commitUpdateComment

        public void commitUpdateComment(Comment comment)
        Update a comment with its own id to the web server, if the comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this comment will be added to the server.
        Parameters:
        comment - a single comment object.

      • loadSpecificComment

        public void loadSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId,
                       CommentMap cm,
                       HomePageActivity activity)
        Put a Comment with the specific id into the CommentMap from the web server in the HomePageActivity(top level).
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id.
        cm - a CommentMap to be update.
        activity - HomePageActivity where the function will be called.

      • loadSpecificComment

        public void loadSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId,
                       CommentMap cm,
                       CommentPageActivity activity)
        Put a Comment in to the CommentMap with the specific id from the web server in the CommentPageActivity(sub level).
        Parameters:
        commentId - String which is the comment id.
        cm - a CommentMap to be update.
        activity - CommentPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • updateTopLevelIdSet

        public void updateTopLevelIdSet(IdSet topLevelIdSet)
        Update the top level comment's IdSet which stored in the server, if there's nothing in the server, then add it to the server.
        Parameters:
        topLevelIdSet - top level comment's IdSet.

      • loadTopLevelComments

        public void loadTopLevelComments(CommentMap topLevelComments,
                        HomePageActivity activity)
        Load all of the top level comments in to the CommentMap.
        Parameters:
        topLevelComments - a CommentMap.
        activity - HomePageActivity where the function will be called.

      • load_update_TopLevelIdSet

        public void load_update_TopLevelIdSet(java.lang.String id,
                             PublishActivity activity)
        Add a comment id to the top level IdSet and update the IdSet in the server while publish a new top level comment.
        Parameters:
        id - a String which is the comment id to be add to the IdSet.
        activity - PublishActivity where the function will be called.

      • loadAndSetSpecificComment

        public void loadAndSetSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId,
                             TextView commentView,
                             TextView authorInfo,
                             ImageView pic,
                             CommentMap cm,
                             CommentPageActivity activity)
        Load a specific Comment by its own Id ; Set the content of this comment in to a TextView ;Set anthorInfo,time posted and location(if its not null) of this comment. into another TextView;Set picture of this comment(if not null) in to an imageView, and all of this comment's replies in to a list view. In the UI: CommentPageActivity.
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id.
        commentView - a TextView will contain the content of the specific comment.
        authorInfo - a TextView will contain the author, publish date, location(if not null).
        pic - a ImageView will contain the picture attached to this comment(if not null).
        cm - a CommentMap will load all of the replies of the specific comment.
        activity - CommentPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • replySpecificComment

        public void replySpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId,
                        java.lang.String replyId)
        Load a specific Comment by it's id and add an reply Comment's id to this comment's reply IdSet.
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id of the comment has been replied.
        replyId - a String which is the comment id of the reply comment.

      • checkEditSpecificComment

        public void checkEditSpecificComment(java.lang.String commentId,
                            java.lang.String userName,
                            CommentPageActivity activity)
        Check if the given userName is the same of the author of the comment with the given comment id, if it is, direct the user to the EditPage in the UI thread(CommentPageActivity). Otherwise, make a toast tell the user he/she can't edit that comment.
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id.
        userName - a String which is the user name of the current user.
        activity - CommentPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • set_up_edit_page

        public void set_up_edit_page(java.lang.String commentId,
                    EditText title,
                    EditText content,
                    ImageView pic,
                    EditPageActivity activity)
        Load a specific comment, Set the content of this comment in to a EditText, Set the title of this comment in to a EditText, set the author info ,time posted,and the location (if not null) into a TextView, set the Picture of this comment(if not null) in to an ImageView in the EditPageActivity.
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id.
        title - an EditText which will contain the title of the comment.
        content - an EditText which will contain the content of the comment.
        pic - a ImageView which will contain the attached picture of this comment(if exist).
        activity - EditPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • commit_edit_comment

        public void commit_edit_comment(java.lang.String commentId,
                       java.lang.String newTitle,
                       java.lang.String newContent)
        Update a edited comment in to the server.
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is commentId
        newTitle - a String which is the title of the comment after edit.
        newContent - a String which is the content of the comment after edit.

      • loadSpecificCommentForCache

        public void loadSpecificCommentForCache(java.lang.String commentId,
                               CacheController cc,
                               CommentPageActivity activity)
        Load a comment specified by id as favorite and store the comment and all its replies in to the sharedpreferences. with key "FAVOURITES"
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id.
        cc - a CacheController object.
        activity - CommentPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • loadSpecificCommentForCacheReply

        public void loadSpecificCommentForCacheReply(java.lang.String commentId,
                                    java.lang.String parentId,
                                    CacheController cc,
                                    CommentPageActivity activity)
        Load a comment for cache ,store it in the sharedpreferences with the key value equals to this comment's parent Id.
        Parameters:
        commentId - a String which is the comment id.
        parentId - a String which is the parent comment id.
        cc - a CacheController object.
        activity - CommentPageActivity where the function will be called.

      • Clean

        public void Clean()
        Testing method used to trash all stuff on the server.
